sentences.en: Credit becomes readily available, asset prices percolate , and many categories of spending are buoyed.
sentences.cn: 信贷唾手可得, 资产价格的上涨渗入各个领域, 各种开支也是越涨越高.

sentences.en: I waited for the coffee to percolate down for a few minutes.
sentences.cn: 我等咖啡滤煮了几分钟.

sentences.en: I'll percolate some coffee for you.
I'll percolate some coffee, ie make it by percolating.
sentences.cn: 我去用过滤法煮些咖啡.

sentences.en: Let the coffee percolate for seven minutes.
Our emotions swim in a soup of hormones and peptides that percolate through our whole body.
sentences.cn: 我们的情绪在浸透了整个身躯的荷尔蒙和缩氨酸的海洋中遨游.

sentences.en: Rain water will only percolate through slowly.
sentences.cn: 雨水只会慢慢地渗进来。

sentences.en: The rain will percolate through the soil.
These ideas were slow to percolate.

words.tran_cn: 过滤器；渗滤器；咖啡渗滤壶

trans.tran_en: if liquid, light, or air percolates somewhere, it passes slowly through a material that has very small holes in it

trans.tran_cn: 滤，渗透，（思想等）渗透，渗入
